definition: (of an organ or body part) diminished in size or strength as a result of disease or injury or lack of use
details:
adjective
- (of an organ or body part) diminished in size or strength as a result of disease or injury or lack of use
= synonyms: atrophied
- made to seem smaller or less (especially in worth)
= synonyms: small
- (of musical intervals) reduction by a semitone of any perfect or minor musical interval
= example: (of musical intervals) reduction by a semitone of any perfect or minor musical interval
- impaired by diminution
= synonyms: weakened, lessened
